channel.title: trip on Pseudoyu
channel.description: Recent content in trip on Pseudoyu

item.title: Weekly Review #62 - Hong Kong Trip, 5am Club Plan, and Learning Rust
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from June 17, 2024 to June 23, 2024. I went to Hong Kong to attend the Google AI+Web3 event and met many colleagues from my team in person; experienced sleeping in an internet cafe due to not being able to book a room; decided to adjust my life rhythm according to the 5am Club philosophy; started learning Rust for the second time; and many other interesting things happened.

item.title: Weekly Review #60 - Beside Bugs, Educational Philosophy and EpubKit
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece is a record and reflection of my life from May 16, 2024 to June 2, 2024. Study Tour in Nanjing I had attended several Yixi talks in Beijing before and quite enjoyed their style. By chance, I saw they were organizing a parent-child study tour in Nanjing. One of the arrangements was to visit the studio of designer/writer Zhu Yingchun, whom my senior

item.title: Weekly Review #59 - Desert Journey, Family and Kin
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece chronicles my life and reflections from May 1st to May 15th, 2024. During the May Day holiday, I traveled to Inner Mongolia with my family. It wasn’t until we set off that I realized this was the first time we had ventured on a distant journey together. Previously, our furthest excursion had been a drive to Shanghai Disneyland. It was quite a different experience.
